title: Adinamunci pogaDi pogaDi
sahitya:
Adinamunci pogaDi pogaDi Ashrayinci nI mahimalanu pADalEdA


anupallavi

  Adi shakti nIvani (namminAnu) nammina nannu Adarinca dayalEdA


caraNam 1    ahibhUSaNuni rANI purANI bhavAnI alikula vENI AshrtarENI ambuja lOcanI 
shyAmakrSNa pAlita jananI akhilalOka pAvanI shyAmaLAmbikE varadE abhaya dAnamIyavE
